src:
Asus Zenfone 6 Segera Masuk Indonesia, Ini Jadwalnya
07 Nov 2019, 14:04 by Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Memakai Zenfone 6. Foto: Anggoro Suryo Jati

Jakarta - Setelah diluncurkan secara global pada akhir Mei lalu, Asus akhirnya memastikan tanggal peluncuran Zenfone 6 di Indonesia.Peluncuran ponsel jagoan Asus itu di Indonesia akan dilakukan pada 15 November mendatang, dan akan dijual perdana secara online. "Peluncurannya tanggal 15 November, pertama dijual di Erafone.com dan Tokopedia," ujar Head of Public Relation & e-Marketing Asus Indonesia, Muhammad Firman kepada detikINET di Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).


Zenfone 6. Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Menurut Firman, varian yang akan dirilis itu punya RAM 6 GB dan storage 128 GB. Sementara spek lainnya sesuai dengan spek ketika ponsel itu dirilis secara global beberapa bulan lalu.Untuk diketahui, Zenfone 6 diluncurkan Asus pada Mei lalu di Spanyol. Spesifikasinya sebagai berikut:Layar: 6,4 inch, IPS LCD, Full HD+Pelindung layar: Gorilla Glass 6Bodi: Kaca dengan Gorilla Glass dan rangka alumuniumChipset: Qualcomm Snapdragon 855GPU: Adreno 640RAM: 6 GB & 8 GBROM: 64 GB, 128 , 256 GBCard slot: microSD up to 1 TBKamera utama : 48 MP, f/1.8, 26mm (wide), 1/2", 0.8µm, Laser/PDAFKamera kedua: 13 MP, f/2.4, 11mm (ultrawide)Port: USB Type C, jack audio 3,5 mmKoneksi: WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, NFC, FM Radio, 4G LTESIM Slot: DualSensor: Fingerprint (di belakang bodi), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassBaterai: 5.000 mAh with Quick Charge 4.0 18WWarna: Midnight Black, Twilight SilverDimensi: 159.1 x 75.4 x 9.2 mmBobot: 190 gramOS: ZenUI 6 berbasis Android 9 Simak Video "Zenfone 6 'Made in Indonesia' Mendarat hingga ke Eropa, Apa Kata Asus?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](asj/fyk)
text:
Asus Zenfone 6 Entering Indonesia Soon, This is the Schedule
Nov 7 2019, 14:04 by Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Using Zenfone 6. Photo: Anggoro Suryo Jati

Jakarta - After being launched globally at the end of May, Asus has finally confirmed the launch date of the Zenfone 6 in Indonesia. "The launch on November 15, the first sold at Erafone.com and Tokopedia," said Head of Public Relations & e-Marketing Asus Indonesia, Muhammad Firman to detikINET in Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).


Zenfone 6. Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

According to Firman, the variant that will be released has 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of storage. While other specs in accordance with the spec when the phone was released globally a few months ago. For your information, Zenfone 6 was launched by Asus in May in Spain. The specifications are as follows: Screen: 6.4 inch, IPS LCD, Full HD + Screen protector: Gorilla Glass 6Bodi: Glass with Gorilla Glass and aluminum frameChipset: Qualcomm Snapdragon 855GPU: Adreno 640RAM: 6GB & 8GBROM: 64GB, 128, 256 GBCard slot: microSD up to 1 TB Main camera: 48 MP, f / 1.8, 26mm (wide), 1/2 ", 0.8µm, Laser / PDAF Second camera: 13 MP, f / 2.4, 11mm (ultrawide) Port: USB Type C, 3.5 mm audio jackConnection: WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, NFC, FM Radio, 4G LTESIM Slots: Dual Sensor: Fingerprint (behind the body), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Battery: 5,000 mAh with Quick Charge 4.0 18WWColor: Midnight Black, Twilight Silver Dimensions: 159.1 x 75.4 x 9.2 mm Weighting: 190 gramOS: ZenUI 6 based on Android 9 See Video "Zenfone 6 'Made in Indonesia' Landing to Europe, What Did Asus Say?" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] )
